favorites.Name: Arijit Singh
favorites.Details: Arijit Singh is a singing sensation in India. He has a soulful voice. He sings these complex songs with such ease and conveys the emotions in the songs beautifully. Link to some of his songs on youtube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EiiyYkae33k&ab_channel=T-Series

favorites.Name: Mandalorian
favorites.Details: The Mandalorian is the first live-action series in the Star Wars franchise. It shows the events after Return of the Jedi (1983) where a lone bounty hunter (Mandalorian) travels in the outer reaches of the galaxy to protect the foundling (baby Yoda).

favorites.Name: Soul
favorites.Details: Soul is a new feature film by Pixar Animation Studios. It's a story of a music teacher Joe Gardner. He dies just before his big break as a jazz musician. So, he tries to come back to life and reunite his soul and body. It's a beautiful movie about life's purpose. Link to trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xOsLIiBStEs
